subject: Appointments and Executive Changes
Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Ahead of the London Olympics and 16 months after its last chief executive left in a protracted dispute, USA Track and Field hired Max Siegel, a former board member.
snippet: Ahead of the London Olympics and 16 months after its last chief executive left in a protracted dispute, USA Track and Field hired Max Siegel, a former board member.
